listitem.para: The shell command to run to adjust routing and/or firewalling when the status of the connection changes. May include positional parameters separated by white space (although this requires enclosing the whole string in quotes); including shell metacharacters is unwise. An example to enable routing when using the XFRM stack, one can use:
To disable calling an updown script, set it to the empty string, eg leftupdown=.
Connections with type= set to passthrough, reject or drop never run ipsec _updown.
Relevant only locally, other end need not agree on it.
